manifest.install: CREATE TABLE `ims_top` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `num` int(10) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_top_n` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `fromuser` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `num` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `likai` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fromuser` (`fromuser`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
manifest.uninstall: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_top`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_top_n`;
